title: Geoff Schwartz joins to recap the Divisional Round games!
itunes:title: Geoff Schwartz joins to recap the Divisional Round games!
description:
Dave Dameshek is solo in Studio 66 but our old pal Geoff Schwartz Skypes in to recap the AFC & NFC Divisional round games. First though, Shek and Eddie Spaghetti kibitz about their thoughts on this weekend's games and review their game picks (2:16). Then, we hear from Geoff who recaps Minnesota vs San Francisco, Tennessee vs Baltimore, Houston vs Kansas City and Seattle vs Green Bay (19:52).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
